title: (PDF) Jakość handlowa polskiego masła. Kwartalnik Prawo-Społeczeństwo-Ekonomia. 1 (2015), p.15-25
content: The article presents data related to the production and consumption of butter and the current regulations relating to butter. Discusses the division of milk fats, the use of permitted additives, the information requirements placed on the packa ge, the types of adulteration of butter and food qualit y inspections.
